issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.summary: TestBalancerWithMultipleNameNodes#testBalancing2OutOf3Blockpools fails intermittently due to no free space available

Any reason why this is just committed until branch-2.
This test failed in our internal build running head of branch-2.8
Any objections if I backport to branch-2.8 ?
[~shahrs87], feel free to backport to branch-2.8, :).

Backported to branch-2.9 and branch-2.8.
